mapper.select: select size.* from t_size size join t_type_size ts on ts.size_id = size.id join t_ware ware on ware.id = ts.ware_id where ware.id = #{id}
select type.* from t_ware wa join t_type type on wa.id = type.ware_id where wa.id = #{id}
select sum(stock) from t_type_size ts where ware_id = #{id}
select stock from t_type_size ts where type_id = #{typeId} and size_id = #{sizeId}
select * from t_ware ware join t_type type on ware.id = type.ware_id
